content: to 3 stitches before end of n2 k2tog k1 knit across n1 in pattern on n2 k1 ssk knit to end of round one decrease round complete next round is n2 knit n1 in pattern repeat these decrease rounds until you have reached 32 stitches on n2 knit foot until 1 5 to 2 less than total foot length toe on n2 knit to last 3 stitches k2tog k1 on n1 k1 ssk knit across to last 3 stitches k2tog k1 on n1 k1 ssk knit to end next round is knit continue these toe decrease rounds until you have reached 12 stitches per needle graft the toe and block socks as desired the chart is read from bottom up and right to left
